mapper.select: select bnum, category, region, unum, id, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as createdate, title, content, view_cnt, recommend, isdelete, isreport, isopen from bbs where isdelete = 'N' and bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update bbs set view_cnt = view_cnt+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
update bbs set recommend = recommend+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.delete: update bbs set isdelete='Y' where bnum=#{bnum} and unum=#{unum}
